title: I Should've Told Her
description: Your favorite girls are back with more drama, lies, and deception. Amanda and Stephanie attempt to work on fixing their tattered relationship while Tiffany and Amandaâ€™s relationship continues to drift apart. Stephanie fights to hold on to her man while the others fight to win one back. But when secrets unfold, they soon find themselves fighting for their lives.
author: Veronica E. Kelly
